archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Papers of Sam Shepard ca. 1975-1988
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 350 items.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access Restricted. Contact curator for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Sam Shepard, Accession #10818 , Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains manuscripts, shooting schedules, correspondence, reviews, programs, notes, sheet music, page proofs, drawings, photographs, blueprints, storyboards, posters, contracts, interviews, notebooks and awards.
Works covered include "Crimes of the heart," "Curse of the starving class," "Far north," "Fool for love," "A lie of the mind," "Motel chronicles," "Paris, Texas," and "The war in heaven."
